properties.label: Identifier
properties.hint: Identifier value for record or data. Ex: Account ID, External ID.
properties.name: identifier

properties.label: Transaction type
properties.hint: Type of action/s involved inside the catch scope. Ex: invocation, record insertion, mapping.
properties.name: transactionType

properties.label: Transaction description
properties.hint: Brief description of action/s involved in the catch scope.
properties.name: transactionDescription

properties.label: Date/Time
properties.hint: Timestamp of the action/s. Use timestamp of action or 'now' in formula mode.
properties.name: dateTime

properties.label: Error message
properties.hint: Use an error code defined in the error code lookup table
properties.name: errorMessage
